name: Pumpkin Coffee
description:
Pumpkin Coffee is a slow, relaxing simulation game where you run a coffee shop! Set around Halloween, your goal is to throw the best Monster Bash. This game was made in a little under two weeks during the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022) hosted by Firith Studio. See the jam here: https://itch.io/jam/cozy-autumn-game-jam-2022.

How to play

  1. Customers will arrive on the right of your screen and order a drink.
  2. Click ingredients around your shop to build their order. You can't add later drink ingredients until you add the earlier ones (for example, you can't add sprinkles until you have added whipped cream). You can change the drink as much as you want to before giving it to the customer, so feel free to try out all the options to see what they look like!
  3. When your drink is finished, click the green bell to give it to the customer. Successful drinks will earn you five gold each.
  4. Click the green banner next to the clock to open the shop. The shop categories from left to right are: bunting, shelf decor, wall paint, and wall art. The variations of these items will be available after you select a category. You cannot buy items you can't afford. 
  5. The shop will close at 2:00pm everyday. At close time, you will get an overview of your progress. Your goal is to buy a variant of each of the three items on the list in three days.
  6. Click the button at the bottom of the list to progress to the next day.
  7. Enjoy!
